topic.fullpath: Topic :: Software Development :: Version Control :: CVS

name: syncSQL
short_description: syncSQL is a perl server-side CVS script, that sends commit information to a mySQL database, so commits can be viewed, tracked and filtered throught a simple web page or any mySQL client.
